attributes.action: Engage top genetic scientists to create a Womble like creature.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I was informed the other day that Wombles weren’t real I was shocked, Then anger set in, with today’s scientific know how why should the world suffer without such a majestic creature! I purpose that our glorious leader raise this most detrimental issue with genetic scientists and the like to create the Womble. The Womble is a supremely useful being that has very green credentials indeed which include general litter collection, may I suggest a cross between an Alsatian and Tony Robinson to achieve a true likeness.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
